item.description:
http://worldmusic.org/paco-de-lucia-0-921

at Boston Opera House

"The most advanced guitarist in any idiom " - Guitar review

Paco de Lucía
 From Spain
 Wednesday, April 11, 7:30 PM

Boston Opera House
 539 Washington St
 Boston, 02111
Reserved seating
 $75.00, $55.00, $40.00 (includes Opera House $3.00 restoration fee)


One of the world’s greatest guitarists, Paco de Lucía is a living legend of flamenco music. Considered by many to be the most innovative and influential flamenco artist of the last 40 years, he has had a revolutionary impact on the art form, infusing it with new life and bringing it worldwide attention. Paco de Lucía will be performing with his world-renowned flamenco sextet and the spectacular dancer Farruco.

 PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE, BUY TICKETS NOW! RSVP, MARK YOU HAVE A TICKET 
I BOUGHT MINE AT THE HOUSE, BOX. BALCONY, CENTER R 105
 Suggesting light dinner before at the Salvatore's next door!

http://salvatoresrestaurants.com/

Maia 781-718-6203.. just in case, if I am not able to come, looking for host #1, and #2. Please wear name tag with euro meetup logo "EURO MEETUP" Thank you!!
